title: Add GR Book Ratings to Fort Bend County Library
name: add-gr-book-ratings-to-fort-bend-county-library
description: Adds the average user rating from GoodReads to the Fort Bend County Library website. Visit www.fortbend.lib.tx.us, perform a search for books, and look for the blue icon to appear at the top-right of your browser. Note that you must register for a free GoodReads developer API key and copy it into this Add-On's options.
author: Zach Walker (http://www.zachwalker.net)

preferences.name: grAPIkey
preferences.title: GoodReads Developer API Key (restart required)
preferences.description: Log in to your GoodReads account, go here https://www.goodreads.com/api/keys to get a free developer API key, and paste it here. Then restart Firefox and the Add-On should start working.
